price: 50. Voici un Rappel béni que Nous avons fait descendre (en révélation). Le nieriez-vous donc ?
arabic: وَهَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞ مُّبَارَكٌ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُۚ أَفَأَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wahādhā dhik'run mubārakun anzalnāhu afa-antum lahu munkirūna
